[LinearElamite.ttf](https://github.com/pannous/hieros/raw/master/fonts/LinearElamite.ttf) semi official font mapping from private font range 0xE000 â€¦ to the [proposed unicode range](https://www.unicode.org/L2/L2021/21233-linear-elamite.pdf)

[IndusHarappan.ttf](https://github.com/pannous/hieros/raw/master/fonts/IndusHarappan.ttf) completely inofficial, to see [Indus](Indus.html) Harrapan [signs](https://github.com/pannous/hieros/raw/master/abc/indus_harrapan_script.abc)
